name: @financial-times/useragent_parser
description: This is the VCL & JS implementation of the [ua-parser](https://github.com/tobie/ua-parser)

scripts.update: npm ci && git remote add -f uap-ref-impl https://github.com/ua-parser/uap-ref-impl.git; git remote add -f uap-core https://github.com/ua-parser/uap-core.git; git fetch uap-core master && git fetch uap-ref-impl master && git subtree pull --prefix uap-ref-impl uap-ref-impl master --squash && git subtree pull --prefix uap-core uap-core master --squash && node ./compilers/vcl.js && node ./compilers/js.js

author: Jake Champion
